main event: A witness observed a luminous object in the sky on a clear, moonlit night. The object appeared to be suspended and then moved off at a high rate of speed.
interesting points: The object moved behind and in front of clouds.
The object made no sound like an airplane, only a low humming noise.
The object was blue on top and white on the bottom and sides.
The witness could not estimate the size or distance of the object because it moved too fast.
The witness drew a sketch of the elongated object with no distinctive features.
photographs: no photographs, only a hand-drawn sketch
